Package com.yahoo.sketches.hive.tuple Description

UDFs for tuple sketches. Tuple sketches are based on the idea of theta sketches with the addition of values associated with unique keys. Two sets of tuple sketch classes are available at the moment: generic tuple sketches with user-defined Summary, and a faster specialized implementation with an array of double values.
Author:
Alexander Saydakov
